subject: return order number: 280324578501029155
description_text:
Hi, I spoke to an agent and was told to email you. I would like to return the Simson shifter. It had a lot of issues, missing shifts in gear 5 and 6. I reached out within a month of receiving it and bought it through Alibaba. Here is a video.
Please let me know how to conduct the return.
Thank you,
Hassan

conversations.body_text: Hi Hassan Majid, Please provide your order number so we can check for you. If it's a return and refund, you can directly apply for after-sales service for the order.

Hi, this is my order number 280324578501029155
Thanks
On Mon, Dec 29, 2025, 4:55 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Hassan Majid, We're sorry, we couldn't find your order number. Please provide a screenshot of your order page.

Hi
I haven't received a follow-up. I sent screenshots.
On Tue, Dec 30, 2025, 3:22 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Hassan Majid, Could you please check whether the bottom mounting screws are too long, causing them to block the movement of the shifter?

Yes, I've checked. I'd like to return this, please. Let me know how to proceed.
Thank you
On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 10:35 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Hassan Majid, A colleague will contact you.
